statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (101, 105, 110) ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_description FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY behavior_type ASC
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'Purchase'
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM customer_behavior LIMIT 3
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id < 5 ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase'
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM customer_behavior
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_description LIKE '%loyal%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY behavior_count DESC
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM customer_behavior
SELECT behavior_type, customer_id, timestamp FROM customer_behavior
SELECT * FROM sales_performance WHERE sales_date = '2023-01-15'
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_performance ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT product_id, current_quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < 100
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT behavior_type, timestamp, customer_id FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sales_amount, product_id, sales_date FROM sales_performance WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < 10
SELECT product_id, current_quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_levels WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM Customer_Reports ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM Customer_Reports WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM Customer_Reports WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory_Levels WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT total_sales, sales_date FROM Sales_Performance ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM Customer_Reports WHERE purchase_date>'2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, total_sales, sales_date FROM Sales_Performance WHERE total_sales>5000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory_Levels WHERE quantity<20 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT report_id, revenue, profit FROM Business_Performance WHERE expenses<10000 OR revenue>50000;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Reports INNER JOIN Sales_Performance ON Customer_Reports.customer_id = Sales_Performance.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, order_id, product_name, quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN sales s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_available FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE quantity_available < 10;
